headline: Jim Cramer Thinks Newmont (NEM) Is a Gold Play That’s Had an Amazing Run!
summary: We recently published a list of Jim Cramer Looked At These 23 Stocks Recently. In this article, we are going to take a look at where Newmont Corporation (NYSE:NEM) stands against other stocks that Jim Cramer looked at recently. Jim Cramer, the host of Mad Money, offered an optimistic perspective on the market on Thursday […]
